alert.note: Alert for Jefferson; Lewis (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 25 at 7:51AM EST by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...A BAND OF VERY HEAVY SNOW LAKE EFFECT SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF JEFFERSON AND LEWIS COUNTIES THIS MORNING... HAZARDS...A band of very heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 40 MPH is creating frequent visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. This band of heavy snow is producing snow at the rate of 2 to 3 inches per hour. Travel is nearly impossible within this band. DO NOT attempt to travel in this band. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 746 AM EST, a lake effect snow band was across the northern half of Jefferson county, along and north of Watertown and Fort Drum northeast into far northern Lewis county. This band will stay nearly stationary through 10 AM. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Watertown, Fort Drum, Stony Point, Dexter, Glen Park, Herrings, Redwood, Adams Center, Henderson Harbor, Southwick Beach State Park, Sackets Harbor, Henderson, Black River, Smithville, Philadelphia, Brownville, Theresa, Antwerp, Chaumont and Evans Mills. This includes Interstate 81 between exits 42 and 49. SAFETY INFO... Travel is difficult if not impossible due to recent blizzard conditions. Observe all existing travel bans. &&
